name: Royal Glory
description:
You don't know where are you or even who are you, but you do know that there are hostiles coming out to get you at every spot. It's time to sharpen up your abilities to the fullest to survive the onslaught of enemies.

Royal Glory is a wave based pixel art action survival game. To win the game, you will have to survive the deadly waves until the end.  During the battle you will not only encounter deadly foes, but you will also be getting stronger yourself by unlocking and upgrading various abilities. 

You can as well find the controls explained in game. This is my first fully developed game so I do hope you will enjoy it, feel free to share your thoughts and suggestions in the comments.
